conditions.name: Citizen is
description: Checks if a citizen has a certain ID.

conditions.name: Citizen is named
description: A conditional check using citizens names over id numbers

conditions.name: Is Glowing
description: Check to see if a player is currently glowing

conditions.name: Sidebar Is Set
description: This will check if a sidebar is being displayed to a player

effects.name: Add Player to ID Based Bossbar
description: Add a player to an ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Add/Remove Players from Group Scores
description: Add or removed a players group based score.

effects.name: Add/Set Bossbar Flag
description: Add a flag to a ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Animated Ball Effect
description: Creates an EffectLib animated ball effect.
patterns: (spawn|create|apply) (a|the|an) animated ball (effect|formation) (at|on|for|to) %entity/location% with id %string% [with particle %visualeffects%] [offset by %number%, %number%(,| and) %number%]

effects.name: Arc Effect
patterns: (spawn|create|apply) (a|the|an) arc (effect|formation) from %entity/location% to %entity/location% with id %string% [with particle[s] %visualeffects%] [%number% high] [and %number% particles]

effects.name: Bleed Effect
examples: create a bleed effect to player with id "test"

effects.name: Change Citizen Skin
description: Change the skin of a citizen by:
This will change the skin of an NPC to a given Minecraft username
examples: create a citizen named "notch" at location of player
change citizen last created citizen skin to "eyesniper2"

effects.name: Citizen Hold
description: This will make a Citizen hold an object in their hand.
examples: make citizen last created citizen id hold iron sword

effects.name: Citizen Invulnerability
description: Change if a citizen takes damage by:
This will allow you to choose if an NPC can receive damage

effects.name: Citizen Look Targeting
description: Change the view of a citizen by:
Pick a location for an NPC to look at

effects.name: Citizen Max Health
description: Will allow you to modify the maximum amount of health an NPC can have. 0.5 = half a heart, 1 = a heart, etc...

effects.name: Citizen Nametag Visibility
description: For if you want to toggle the visibility of names above the NPC's head

effects.name: Citizens Look Close Trait
description: Allow citizens to look at the closest player automatically. This effect is toggleable, so to disable this trait for a citizen run this effect again.

effects.name: Citizens Look Close Trait
description: Allow citizens to look at the closest player automatically. This effect is toggleable, so to disable this trait for a citizen run this effect again.

effects.name: Create Citizen
description: This will place an NPC in your world that can be modified
examples: create a citizen named "%arg 1%" at location of player as a wolf

effects.name: Create Group Based Score
description: Create a group ID based score and assign it to a player or multiple players.
patterns: (set|create) group id [based] score %string% in sidebar for %players% to %number% with id %string%

effects.name: Create ID based Bossbar
description: Create a ID based Bossbar for a group of people.
patterns: create (bossbar|boss bar) title[d] %string% and id %string% for %players% [with (value|progress) %number%] [with colors %bossbarcolor%] [with style %bossbarstyle%] [with flags %bossbarflag%]

effects.name: Delete Sidebar Score
description: This will delete a specified score from a specified player

effects.name: Delete/Stop Effect
description: Stops a EffectLib effect that matches the id value.
examples: create a bleed effect to player with id "bleedtest"

effects.name: Despawn Citizen
description: Unlike delete a citizen this will just kill the NPC you can respawnit back at the created location with the respawn citizen effect.

effects.name: Equip Citizen
description: Give citizens things to hold in their hands and wear

effects.name: Fake Lightning (No Sound)
description: Creates a silent fake lightning strike at a location.
examples: create fake fake lightning at location of player

effects.name: Line Effect
patterns: (spawn|create|apply) (a|the|an) line (effect|formation) from %entity/location% to %entity/location% with id %string% [with particle[s] %visualeffects%]

effects.name: Make Citizen Attack
description: Makes a citizen attack a living entity. The entity must be close enough to the NPC

effects.name: Make Citizen Crouch/Uncrouch/Stand
description: Make a NPC/Citizen Crouch, Uncrouch or stand.

effects.name: Make Citizen Crouch/Uncrouch/Stand
description: Make a NPC/Citizen Crouch, Uncrouch or stand.

effects.name: Make Citizen Swing
description: Force a citizens to play the arm swing animation
examples: make citizen last created citizen swing arm

effects.name: Make Citizen Talk
description: This will make an NPC speak to a player with a custom message
examples: make citizen arg 1 say "%arg 2%" to player

effects.name: Make Player Glow
description: Make a player glow. This is based on team color, will be white by default.

effects.name: Max Health
description: This will change the maximum health of an entity
patterns: set rf max[imum] h(p|ealth) of %livingentities% to %number%

effects.name: Move Citizen
description: This will make a given NPC pathfind to a location
examples: move citizen 1 to location of player at speed 2

effects.name: Play Resource Pack Sound
description: Play a sound from a resource pack.

effects.name: Play Sound
description: * This will play a sound to a player and nobody else

If you want a list of skRayFall sounds go https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/spigot/ click ctrl + f and type 'sound' then press the down arrow once and then click the sound that is shown in green text and that will list all the sounds for you

effects.name: Players Tab Name
description: Lets you customize a players name within the tab menu. Please note the ['s] was added as of 1.9.18.

effects.name: Remove Citizen
description: This will permanently remove a citizen

effects.name: Remove Player from BossBar
description: Remove a player from a ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Remove/Delete Bossbar Flag
description: Remove a flag from a ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Respawn Citizen
description: This will force an NPC to come back to life if it was previously killed or despawned by the despawn citizen effect. This will not work if the citizen is already alive so it can't be used to duplicate citizens
examples: respawn citizen 0 at location of player

effects.name: Send Title
description: This will send a title to a player with an optional subtitle and display time
patterns: send %players% title %string% [with subtitle %string%] [for %timespan%] [with %timespan% fade in and %timespan% fade out]

effects.name: Set Action Bar
description: This will display text above the player's hotbar for a few seconds. This is like the text you receive when changing the item in your hand

effects.name: Set Below Name Score
description: Set score of a sidebar by:
This will change the name and score below a player's name

effects.name: Set Bossbar Color
description: Set the color of an ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Set Bossbar Progress/Value
description: Set the progress of an ID based bossbar.

effects.name: Set Bossbar Style
description: Set the style of an ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Set Bossbar Title/Name
description: Set the name of an ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Set Citizens Name
description: Set the name of a citizen/npc using their ID number.

effects.name: Set ID based Score
description: Make an ID based score in a players scoreboard. This method is ideal for creating complex text based scoreboards.
patterns: (set|create) id [based] score %string% in sidebar of %player% to %number% with id %string%

effects.name: Set Meta Data
description: Set a meta data on an entity to a value

effects.name: Set Sidebar Name
description: This will change the name of a player's sidebar. The sidebar of the player must have at least one score in order for it to show on the sidebar

effects.name: Set Sidebar Score
description: Set score of a sidebar by:
This will change the score of a score in a player's sidebar or create a new score if it does not exist
patterns: set score %string% in sidebar of %player% to %number%

effects.name: Set Tab Header & Footer
description: This will display a client side header and footer for a player
patterns: set tab header to %string% and footer to %string% for %player%

effects.name: Set Tablist Score
description: This will change the score for a player in the tablist
patterns: set tab[list] score of %player% to %number% for %player%

effects.name: Show Particle
description: This will display a particle at a given location for a player. This is client side!
patterns: show %number% %string% particle[s] at %location% for %player% [offset by %number%, %number%( and|,) %number%]

effects.name: Show/Unhide Bossbar
description: Show a hidden ID based Bossbar.

effects.name: Text Effect
examples: apply the text effect with text "Text Effect" as Redstone to player with id "texteffecttest"
patterns: (spawn|create|apply) (a|the|an) text (effect|formation) with text %string% as %visualeffects% (at|on|for|to) %entities/location% with id %string%[(,| and) %number% large]

effects.name: Tornado Effect
patterns: (spawn|create|apply) (a|the|an) tornado (effect|formation) at %entity/location% with id %string% [with tornado particle[s] %visualeffects% and cloud particle[s] %visualeffects%] [(set|and) radius %number%] [(set|and) max height %number%]

effects.name: Unglow/Stop Glowing
description: Remove the glowing effect from the player.

effects.name: Wipe Below Name
description: This will wipe the score below the player

effects.name: Wipe Tablist Score
description: This will remove the score from a player in the tablist

effects.name: Wipe/Delete/Remove Sidebar
description: This will completely wipe a specified player's sidebar deleting all scores and the name of the sidebar.

expressions.name: Absolute Amount of Items
description: Get the number of items in a playerâ€™s inventory that are an absolute match to a sample item. To match they must have the same enchants, name and lore.

expressions.name: Citizen ID
description: Get the id number of a citizen from an entity.

expressions.name: Citizen Owner
description: Gets the owner of a citizen.

expressions.name: Convert Text to Location
description: Convert a comma separated string of x, y and z cords into a location. eg. "1.3,4.5,1.5" to a location

expressions.name: General Citizen
description: Get the general entity for a citizen

expressions.name: Group Score Value
description: These expressions will get either the name or value of a group based score.

expressions.name: Info of Enchantment
description: Get the presentable info of a specific enchantment number of an item.

expressions.name: Last Created Citizen ID
description: You can use this to check the ID of the last created citizen good for if you want to check the unique ID of a citizen you just created
examples: create a citizen named "%arg 1%" at location of player as a player

expressions.name: Meta Data
description: Get the meta data value for an entity

expressions.name: Name of Citizen
description: This will allow you to check and set an NPC's name

expressions.name: Name/Title of Sidebar
description: Get the name/title of a players side bar.

expressions.name: No NBT
description: Using this expression will remove all vanilla minecraft lore from an item. For example a diamond sword would not show the vanilla +7 damage in the lore anymore

expressions.name: Number of Enchantments
description: Get the number of enchantments on an item.

expressions.name: Shiny Item
description: Makes an item glow as an enchanted item but without the lore

expressions.name: Single ID Score Value
description: These expressions will get either the name or value of a ID based score.

expressions.name: Title/Name of BossBar
description: Get the name of an ID based Bossbar.

expressions.name: Value/Progress of Bossbar
description: Get the value of an ID based Bossbar.

expressions.name: skRayFall Offhand
description: Manipulate items in the players offhand/secondary hand.
examples: set player's offhand to 1 diamond block

types.name: Bossbar Color
description: A data type to call the colors for the new 1.9 bossbars.
types.usage: blue, green, pink, purple, red, white or yellow

types.name: Bossbar Flag
description: Bar Flags to support the new 1.9 bossbars.
types.usage: create fog, darken sky or play boss music

types.name: Bossbar Style
description: Bossbar styles to support the new 1.9 BossBar.
types.usage: segmented 10, segmented 12, segmented 20, segmented 6 and solid
